plot: In a world where life's lessons are taught by strangely askew public service announcements, a young girl rebels against her twisted parents and finds love with the charming boy next door.
title: Methods in Good Breeding
plot_es: In a world where life's lessons are taught by strangely askew public service announcements, a young girl rebels against her twisted parents and finds love with the charming boy next door.
